articles.description: Lung cancer drug osimertinib has been shown to work for twice as long as the standard therapies and costs $8000 per month. From January 1, it will drop to $41.30.
articles.content:
We were devastated, absolutely devastated, she said.
But she thinks of herself as lucky in a way. Because her cancer has the EGFR mutation, shes been able to take a drug called osimertinib which fro… [+2923 chars]
